title: How to stream audio from a stereo system with aux ports to multiple smartphones at once - Quora

response.answer_text: Buy a cheap “tablet” device. There should be a streaming app out there that you can install (think podcast). It should be able to take an audio input (via the 3.5 jack) and convert that analog stream to digital and stream it on a given IP address. Each of the smartphones should be able to join that stream and, tada, your music everywhere.
